name: Merge Tycoon - Idle Game
description:
Farm for gold and become the king idle tycoon on the adventure. Merge Miner will provide you with a plane ground you are looking for to become best idle tycoon!

Only 1% makes it to the top, will you take the challenge?

Buy and merge your miner so you can make them collect gold and build an idle miner tycoon!
Unlock miners and trucks to earn lots of cash!
Merge, build your farm, and become capitalist!


Gold Membership offers a weekly subscription, you will have a 3-days FREE trail period, after this period you will be charged for $7.99.

After buying this subscription, you will unlock the following features: +50% speed of all trucks, +20% offline earnings, get 5 golden boxes per day, remove pop-up ads, get 10 diamonds per day.
